title: Plumbug
desc:
Post 1721
*Seems safe...*
- The water supply has been tainted by plumbum! Whenever this affects a card, whoever played that card must draw a card.
- Any non-<:tinsect:1172249217272643604> card that forms a Compound with this card will have its effects activate when this affects a card. If it affects a player, it will affect whoever played that card.
